author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 'Teen Mom' Kailyn Lowry Shares Special Pic Of Twin?
text:
Summary by Ground News Kailyn Lowry recently shared a video that continued to tell the birth story of her son Rio. In the thumbnail of the video, fans clocked a photo they thought ended up there by mistake. The photo appeared to be Elijah Scott asleep with a baby on his chest. Fans, however, just weren't sure the baby was Rio. Share menu More
